author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
Recently KDE announced that after the 6.7 release with 6.8 they would be going Wayland only, this is much earlier than when we initially thought it was going to happen so lets talk about this change.

title: We Need To Talk About KDE Plasma's Future
